Sep 14, 2015

SQL

alias reusing

Simply wrap your reused alias with (SELECT alias)

SELECT 10 AS my_num, 
       (SELECT my_num) * 5 AS another_number
FROM table

Aliases in sql are not like variables in a programming language. Aliases can only be referenced again at certain points (particularly in GROUP BY and HAVING clauses). But you canâ€™t reuse an alias in the SELECT clause.

Or you could just duplicate the work:

SELECT 10 AS my_num, 10 * 5 AS another_number FROM table;

using an alias
